title: GIPMER Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 23 Senior Resident Posts
description: Govind Ballabh Pant Institute of Postgraduate Medical Education and Research (GIPMER) has declared the official notification fr 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 23 Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MS/ MD can grab this chance and apply for the GIPEMER Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk...
